item.title: Autism rate rises to 3% of children in CDC study
item.description: CDC experts were not made available to discuss the findings showing a rise in autism prevalence.

item.title: 25 U.S. cities where a $100,000 a year isn't enough to get by anymore
item.description: In these major U.S. cities, a family of three earning $100,000 would have a hard time covering basic expenses.

item.title: Husband and wife arrested 24 years after man found dead in his truck
item.description: Police did not say what led them to arrest the couple, but both have been charged with murder and are in custody.

item.title: Mar 12: CBS News 24/7, 1pm ET
item.description: Trump's 25% tariffs on steel and aluminum take effect, prompting EU and Canada to retaliate; NASA set to bring astronauts home after eight-day mission...

item.title: Mar 12: CBS News 24/7, 10am ET
item.description: Inflation rate hits 2.8% in February, less than expected; SpaceX Crew 10 mission set for launch, could pave way for return of Starliner astronauts.
